results.name: GuessEther
results.description: GuessEther is a fair casino base on Smart Contract
results.fullDescription:
GuessEther is a fair casino base on Smart Contract,You are betting on the time of specific ethereum block height(number).
 
1.Choose your bet number(0~99).
2.To win, the last 2 digits of block unix timestamp needs to be equal to your number.

results.fullDescription: Indorse is a skill based professional network that gives data ownership back to the users. Indorse uses rewards and a reputation system to incentivize users to add their accomplishments and endorse those of others.

results.name: ygot
results.description: Wangaci dog is a decentralized, trustless blockcha
results.fullDescription: Wangaci dog is a decentralized, trustless blockchain game that runs directly on the Ethereum network. Like the CryptoCat, Wangaci dog is a decentralized application (Dapp) running on the Ethereum network. The game is completely decentralized and unchanged by anyone, no matter how big the pot is, it will only be paid according to the rules of the game.

results.name: Etherdrop
results.description: Etherdrop is a lottery smart-contract built on top
results.fullDescription:
Etherdrop is a lottery smart-contract built on top of the ethereum blockchain. Participating is straight and easy:


	Send the round ether amount from your wallet, and that's it you'r in!
	Wait until the drop is Full and ready to be sent
	A random number will be derived from the blocks hashes
	If your subscription order matches the number, you collect the Jackpot of 18ETH ! You can participate in 3 types of rounds, and only one time (wallet address) per round:
	
		Large Drop: long round of 1000 users, hard win probability
		Medium Drop: average round of 100 users, med win probability
		Smaller Drop: fast round of 10 users, easy win probability

results.fullDescription: Allows safely buy vanity Bitcoin address over smart contract. Anyone is able to mine addresses for ETH. Cryptographically secure.

results.name: SpicyPot
results.description: Spicy Pot是服務全球華人以太坊遊戲平臺： 在以太坊網絡上運行的分布式，無信任的區塊鏈遊戲。和
results.fullDescription: Spicy Pot是服務全球華人以太坊遊戲平臺： 在以太坊網絡上運行的分布式，無信任的區塊鏈遊戲。和以太猫一樣，Spicy Pot是以太坊網絡上運行的分散應用程序（Dapp）。該遊戲由智慧合約精心程式設計和部署，本身完全去中心化，不受任何人控制，它將自動運行直到乙太坊網絡死亡，無論獎池有多麼誘人，只會根據遊戲規則進行支付。 這是一個彩票遊戲，最後一个玩家在一輪倒數計時（12:00:00）結束時購買鑰匙則贏走彩池！ 每輪遊戲期間有其他玩家購買鑰匙時，玩家會從根據key的擁有比例在遊戲中獲得分紅。這些獎勵可以隨時提現。

results.name: DEx.top
results.description: DEx.top is a decentralized Ethereum-token exchange
results.fullDescription: DEx.top is a decentralized Ethereum-token exchange platform based on smart contract. It introduces the innovative ROC (Replayed On Chain) trading mechanism that leverages the synchronized off-chain and on-chain ledgers to enable instant trading while making traders' assets safe. DEx.top is committed to providing the most secure, instant, and low-cost trading experience to end users in all levels.

results.name: Ninja Prediction
results.description: Ninja is an anonymous peer-to-peer decentralized p
results.fullDescription: Ninja is an anonymous peer-to-peer decentralized prediction exchange running on top of the Ethereum blockchain. It allows parties to directly bet against each other without going through a central authority or bookmaker. This makes it 100% anonymous, no signs up no downloads required. The management of bets and the settlement of winnings are carried out collectively by the blockchain network, protecting users from any single point of failure. You can also create your own prediction markets.

results.name: CryptoPets
results.description: CryptoPets is an up and coming blockchain-based vi
results.fullDescription: CryptoPets is an up and coming blockchain-based video game where players train, trade, battle their digital creatures in virtual competitions. Power up your monstrous agents through in-game achievements from winning and tournaments and work with online allies to achieve cooperative achievements in this one-of-a-kind departure from traditional PVP turn-based battle games. In the near future, people are measured for cognitive performance within advanced digital reality simulations. They are transported across ultra-realistic realms where every move they make is a piece of data that is tracked, measured, and evaluated. The greatest performers are handpicked for unknown riches that lay beyond... Are you skillful enough to be among them?

results.name: Token Multisender

results.fullDescription: If you want to save some time on sending multiple token transfers, you can use multisender. It can generate transactions using metamask in trust-less way by using only javascript and smart contract. Mostly used by crypto funds, airdroppers where you can submit a list of addresses with balances in CSV format. It has processed ~9k transactions on mainnet.

It can be used to borrow stablecoins against users’ favorite cryptocurrencies, increase exposure against them using Multiply, or Earn a competitive yield. This can be done across multiple protocols and Layers — all in one place. Summer.fi’s mission is to provide the most trusted entry point to deploy capital into DeFi. The team is made of passionate thinkers and builders driven to create a better user experience for all while being able to maximize returns.

results.name: Doges On Trial
results.description: Kleros proposes a completely innovative way of doi
results.fullDescription: Kleros proposes a completely innovative way of doing dispute resolution, a method based on game theory to generate economic incentives for jurors to rule cases honestly and on blockchain to guarantee security in the process (to learn more, read our white paper). Doges on Trial, our first cryptoeconomic experiment on the Ethereum mainnet, is based on Kleros’ curated list application, a key area of research within the decentralized ecosystem.

results.name: Retro Block: Rob The Bank
results.description: Users will need to purchase a key from a master lo
results.fullDescription: Users will need to purchase a key from a master locksmith.  Due to the sophistication of the bank’s vault the locksmith can’t guarantee that each and every key made can unlock the vault.  The lock to the vault is changed daily for added security. Every 24 hours one key will have the ability to unlock the vault.  Once the vault is unlocked the bags and bags of cash are in your hands.  But wait, unlocking the vault is the easy part of the heist.  Finding the right exit is where it gets tricky.  The bank vault has 50 exits, but only one exit takes you out of the bank and to safety.  All other exits are guarded with highly dangerous drones that will shoot at anything that walks through those doors.  As the locksmith creates more keys and more doors have been tried, both the locksmith and robber will gain very important insight making each heist more possible as time goes on.  Everything is in the hands of the key-holder.  Do you have what it takes to rob the bank?

results.name: Zomo5D
results.description: The rules of the game are simple. All you have to
results.fullDescription: The rules of the game are simple. All you have to do is buy diamonds to join this new game. In the beginning, the price of a diamond is about $0.029, which will extend the game's countdown to 30 seconds, with a ceiling of 24 hours. When the time ends, the 50% of the prize pool will be awarded to the last lucky player who buys the diamond. 10% of the prize pool will be awarded to the second-to-last lucky player who buys the diamond. 5% will be awarded to the third-best lucky player who buys diamonds. 10% of the prize pool will be allocated to the next round of games. 25% of the prize pool will be returned to all players according to the proportion of diamonds held. Please remember to receive the prize at the end of each round. The whole game is built on the smart contract of Ethereum, so the prize pool is fully protected. The bonus distribution after the game is fully automated, and 100% of the player's rights to participate in the game are guaranteed.

results.name: Blockonix
results.description: Blockonix is a 100% decentralized exchange that is
results.fullDescription: Blockonix is a 100% decentralized exchange that is run through smart contracts, with no human interference. The exchange allows trading of ERC20 tokens with ETH and USDT (Tether ERC20). The trading fee on the exchange is 0.03% if you pay using the native BDT tokens, and 0.1% if you pay using ETH. The BDT tokens collected through trading fee are 100% burned, and the ETH collected are used to buy back BDT and burn them, meaning that Blockonix is meant for its community and the entire earning is used for the community.

In CryptIdols users may register their idols for contests and trade (sell) their idols to other users receiving ETH in the process. Imagine and create, train and sell, join CryptIdols today!
